reviewText: Great condition as a spice girl collector I was very pleased

To see pictures of Geri topless or with very little clothing on.. At least that is why my ex bought this video! This video is about Geri and her "glamour/fashion" modeling before her career as a Spice Girl. There are interviews on the video with people Geri previously worked with and many positive things are said about her. The cover makes it look like a really trashy video, but it isn't that bad. I would have enjoyed it more if the cover hadn't made the video out to look so distasteful, but that is what sells.

I recently gave the tape to a friend of mine who loves the Spice Girls but her boyfriend cannot stand them! This video they actually watched together! ;)

If you are a *gigantic* Spice Girls - Ginger fan, you will want this for your collection, however it is *NOT* for young viewers with the semi-nude content. No other Spice Girls are featured in this video.

I've seen clips and I've seen lot's of the pictures.  Unfortunately, being as it's in NTSC format and not PAL, I can't watch it until it either comes out on DVD or PAL.  Does anyone know if this will happen?  My aim is to  have more pictures than the video.

I think this shows what you might have to do to get somewhere in the show biz.  It's good money.  She's got a GREAT body and in my opinion is the most beautiful person ever !!  She's my idol in every way.  Any one who  wants to talk to me EMail me.

Just so all the Spice Girls fans out there know, this is a video strictly about Geri.  It mainly deals with her "glamour" photos done before the Spice Girls came about.  If you are a huge Ginger fan then this is something you will want for you collection.  But for the younger viewers she in topless or with very little clothing in the majority of the pictures.  It's a good video as far as it interviews people Geri worked with in the past and they all had very good things to say about her and really liked her as a person.  I guess as they say..if you've got it, flaunt it.  More GIRL POWER to her!  END
